name: Open Concept Lab
description: Open Concept Lab is an open-source terminology management system for the global community

SDGs.evidenceText: The OCL tools and community support global efforts in the fight against infectious diseases, including the US Presidentâ€™s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR) and OpenMRS, the leading open-source medical record system. These communities rely on standards and terminologies to implement systems and to enable health systems research and large-scale biomedical research that helps to make healthcare affordable, safe, effective, and equitable.
